typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TransformedCustomer
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtratedCustomer
TransformedCustomer, ExtratedCustomer join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{{"Cliente ID":"CG-12520"},
		{"Nombre":"Claire"},
		{"Apellido":"Gute"},
		{"Segmento":"Consumer"}}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		idModo as integer,
		Desc as string,
		IdTipoEnvio as integer
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
